headline: Is Carrier Global (CARR) Offering Value After Its 1 Year 20.8% Share Price Decline
summary: If you are wondering whether Carrier Global's current share price offers good value or not, it helps to step back and look at what the numbers are really saying about the business. The stock closed at US$53.50 most recently, with returns of 0.1% over 7 days, a 1.5% decline over 30 days, roughly flat year to date, and a 20.8% decline over 1 year, alongside longer-term returns of 26.3% over 3 years and 36.7% over 5 years. Recent coverage has focused on Carrier Global's position as a pure play...
